backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue, activities, moments, and player save data with functions for availability checks, starting games, and continuing sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and tests with high-level change metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React, game logic, and UI files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed Internet Computer deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operations guide explaining how to keep the backend canister running and troubleshoot availability issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing screens, startup, backend availability checks, game launching, and diagnostics state.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Defines simple local admin gate username and storage key used to unlock admin features.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activities with trust effects and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand-based audio manager that handles volume, mute state, and background music playback using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: 3D Puro character component with idle animation, hover highlighting, and click-triggered dialogue opening.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Touch-device overlay providing joystick, look controls, and jump handling, disabled during pause or terminal use.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look inputs into movement state and exposes methods for updating controls and triggering jumps.
Zustand store for player input state including joystick, look deltas, and one-shot jump requests with a consume mechanism.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Defines customization items and their allowed placement locations for the customization system.
Static dialogue tree defining nodes, choices, trust effects, and branching dialogue logic.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game container that initializes state, sets up the 3D canvas, plays music, and conditionally renders UI panels and pause controls.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Defines categorized response templates and selects one based on keywords in the player's letter.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a drag-and-drop style book sorting game that adjusts trust based on correct or incorrect placements.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Shows a gallery of Puro’s drawings, tracking viewed items and adjusting trust as the player browses.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide‑and‑seek guessing game where finding Puro affects trust and ends the round.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Provides a menu for launching mini‑games and handles switching between them.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Renders a narrative moment with a title, scene text, and close action.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Stores an array of narrative moment definitions including titles, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Defines the 3D library environment with player movement, jumping, camera control, and lighting.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persistent Zustand store managing trust, dialogue, activities, customization, letters, endings, and UI visibility with related actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data with trust thresholds and selects an ending based on trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the ending scene based on trust level, records unlocked endings, and provides options to restart or return to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Renders a menu of activities that modify trust, mark completion, unlock moments, and close the panel.
Allows placing discovered customization items in the library and shows placed and available items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Handles dialogue progression, trust‑based choice filtering, and closing or advancing dialogue nodes.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Lets players write letters, receive generated responses, and view inbox messages.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a menu of story moments, allowing playback of unlocked ones and showing locked ones as obscured.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause menu providing resume, navigation shortcuts, settings, reset options, and an admin-only terminal entry.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides audio settings including mute toggle and volume slider with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows trust level with color-coded label and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health via actor.isAvailable and exposes status, timestamps, errors, and refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, clear, and identity context handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend game operations with React Query hooks for loading and mutating game state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and sets light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with react-query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one‑time app startup, asset preloading, storage checks, and exposes reset utilities.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store for a local admin unlock gate with persistent isUnlocked state.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for local admin unlock form with feedback and lock/unlock controls.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Credits/about screen with game description, feature list, and return button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin‑gated diagnostic terminal overlay supporting command input and output display.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays user‑friendly and detailed game launch errors with retry and back options.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches game runtime errors and displays a UI with optional technical details and a return-to-title button.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Displays a colored server status badge based on backend availability state.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements a small terminal command system supporting help, clear, diagnostics, and server status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats internal diagnostic data into readable terminal output lines.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility and output history with helper methods to append and clear lines.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the game's title screen with server status, admin tools, and buttons for starting, continuing, or configuring the game.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into categorized user‑friendly summaries with preserved raw text.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the frontend startup sequence, initialization tasks, and extension guidelines.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project’s narrative premise, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for a 3D visual-novel adventure game. It tracks versioning and outlines backend, admin-mode, and UI/state requirements.
